thread.title: Dr Dominique Dock
thread.title_full: Goldcar evaluado por Dr Dominique Dock

author: Dr Dominique Dock
title: Dr Dominique Dock
text:
Straight forward and very friendly staff in Porto airport, speaking english, french too !
Cars are in excellent shape; last one I rented 1 month ago needed an extra wash before being rented out to the next customer, so I was billed 30 â‚¬ for the extra work; quite happy with the principle.
